if.test: map.noticeTitle != null or map.noticeContent != null or map.popStatus != null

mapper.sql: user_notice_id, notice_id, user_notice_status, status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, enable_status, user_id, user_id_tmp
mapper.select:
select
distinct
user_notice_id, notice_id, user_notice_status, status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, enable_status, user_id, user_id_tmp,notice_create_time from (select un.user_notice_id, un.notice_id, un.user_notice_status, un.status, un.creater, un.create_time, un.modifier, un.modify_time, un.reorder, un.remark, un.enable_status, un.user_id, un.user_id_tmp,n.create_time notice_create_time from rf_user_notice un LEFT JOIN rf_notice n on un.notice_id=n.notice_id) rf_user_notice
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select nextval('seq_rf_user_notice')
insert into rf_user_notice (user_notice_id, notice_id, user_notice_status, status, creater, create_time, modifier, modify_time, reorder, remark, enable_status, user_id, user_id_tmp) values (#{userNoticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{noticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userNoticeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enableStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userIdTmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select nextval('seq_rf_user_notice')

user_notice_id,

update rf_user_notice
user_notice_id = #{record.userNoticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
notice_id = #{record.noticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_notice_status = #{record.userNoticeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

user_id = #{record.userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id_tmp = #{record.userIdTmp,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where user_notice_id = #{userNoticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

from rf_user_notice
order by ${orderByClause}
offset 0 limit 1
mapper.update:
update rf_user_notice
notice_id = (case when notice_id is null then #{noticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else notice_id + #{noticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
reorder = (case when reorder is null then #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} else reorder + #{reorder,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
user_id = (case when user_id is null then #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} else user_id + #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER} end ),
where user_notice_id = #{userNoticeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
insert /*+ append */ into rf_user_notice(user_notice_id,notice_id,user_id_tmp, user_notice_status,status,creater,create_time,modifier, modify_time,reorder,remark,enable_status,user_id)
SELECT nextval('seq_rf_user_notice'),#{noticeId},'','0','1',#{creater},now(), #{modifier},now(),'1','1','1', ru.user_id from rf_user ru where exists (select user_id from rf_user_pad rup left join rf_pad rp on rp.pad_id=rup.pad_id where ru.user_id=rup.user_id AND rp.bind_status='1'
and rp.pad_name LIKE #{padName} || '%'
and rp.pad_code LIKE #{padCode} || '%' and t.pad_ip LIKE #{padIp} || '%' )
